content: learn how to crochet this beautiful and eye-catching cowl this mosaic crochet pattern comes with a color chart and uses worsted-weight yarn > but you can also purchase the ad-free > printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry > this pattern can also be found in my > crochet membership which includes over > 300 patterns and 100s of video > tutorials you can join the membership > here 1 ***you can also learn mosaic crochet with this ebook with 40 additional crochet patterns and 8 tutorials and tips right here 2 1 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet/the-crochet-club/ 2 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/mosaic-crochet-made-easy/ ref=ravelry
